: : Hollywood : :

other.

w World Order

t: Re: nWo base


  : : Razor : :

  Razor: I have some left over parts we =
could use to make the connection. We should all get to work on that soon.

=

n paid for by the

    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
 From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, Augus=
t 16, 2002 11:39 PM
    Subject: Re: nWo base


    : : Hollywood : :

    =
Hollywood nods in agreement to his own idea.

    Hollywood:  That's right =
brother, it'll save us having to make it a bombing zone out here, and it wi=
ll just add on to our power!

    Sting:  Couldn't agree more, Hollywood.

=
    -----------------------------------------------------------------------=
---------------
    The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
  =
  New World Order


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: RoboRic=
k007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002=
 11:21 PM
      Subject: Re: nWo base


      : : Razor : :

      He think=
s about Hollywood's idea.

      Razor: I agree. We can attach to ship dire=
ctly to the cave entrance. We can use the ship exits on the other side. Thi=
s way we can use the ships space and systems.

      **********************=
**********************************
      The preceding has been paid for by=
 the
      New World Order

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        F=
rom: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday,=
 August 16, 2002 11:05 PM
        Subject: Re: nWo base


        : : Holly=
wood/Sting : :

        Hollywood turned to look at Diesel and Razor.

    =
    Hollywood:  Oh, hey guys.  The ship has a lot of goodies.  On these dis=
ks, is every byte of data on this computer, including a map of the whole Ea=
rth, and it maps the locations of the transformer factions here too, and ot=
her stuff.  Right now brothers, I'm just checking the quality of the parts =
of the ship.  It could possible serve useful to attach it to our own base.
=

        Meanwhile, Sting comes out of his CR Chamber.  He was formerly bla=
ck and white, and although it was fitting, not only did he get the logo, bu=
t all the white on him was replaced with red.  He sees that the entrance is=
 open, and exits the base.  He then sees that Diesel, Razor and Hollywood a=
re inside the ship.  He walks in.

        Sting:  Oh,  hey guys.  What hav=
e you done here so far, Hollywood?

        Hollywood:  Oh, nothing much br=
other, I've contained all the data stored on the ship onto these disks, and=
 I'm just taking a look at the equipment.

        ------------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------
        The =
preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
        New World Order


=
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: RoboRick007 
      =
    To: Neo Beast Wars 
          Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 10:44 PM
  =
        Subject: nWo base


          : : Razor / Diesel : :

          Bot=
h Razor and Diesel come out of the CR chambers. Razor was already black and=
 white, the only change was the nWo logo. Diesel retained his black and sil=
ver, again only the nWo logo was new.

          They looked around seeing =
that Hollywood was gone.

          Razor: Maybe he is in the ship.

      =
    They both walk out and notice that the doors are open. They climb into =
the ship.

          Diesel: Find anything worthwhile Hollywood?

         =
